titleStmt.title: Of our obligation to put our trust in God, rather than in men, and of the advantages of it in a sermon preached before the honourable society of Grayes-inn, upon the occasion of the death of our late Royal Sovereign Queen Mary / by William Wake ...
titleStmt.author: Wake, William, 1657-1737.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
